Appearance

GoManager

GoManager is a versatile and efficient library designed to simplify state management.

Learn
Reference

State Management

GoManager provides intuitive mechanisms for creating, updating, and accessing state data. You can define initial states for your objects and modify them dynamically as needed.

Event Handling

It offers robust event handling capabilities, enabling you to register listeners for specific state changes or custom events.

Ease to Use

Is beginner-friendly and easy to use. It minimizes boilerplate code and complexity, allowing you to focus on your game logic.
